description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of Grand Dyck paths of semilength n having first return to the x-axis at (2k,0) (n,k >= 1). (A Grand Dyck path of semilength n is a path in the half-plane x >= 0, starting at (0,0), ending at (2n,0) and consisting of steps u=(1,1) and d=(1,-1)).
